root: ^My Lord, everything is going according to plan. I can already see the capital of the Empire under our rule !
^All this gold will definitely help us summon more powerful allies as we go. But for now we should focus on building a strong base.
^Who knows, maybe someday we will be able to summon a Vampire.. Or even better, a Werewolf ~
^I will now head to the barracks, these goblins could do with a little bit more... Enthusiasm...
